main event: A witness observed a bright light in the night sky, larger than any star, which moved slowly before suddenly disappearing after about 6 minutes of observation.
interesting points: The light was brighter than any star and seemed to be moving slowly before vanishing., The observation lasted approximately 6 minutes., The light appeared to get dimmer before it suddenly disappeared., The report suggested possibilities like a balloon or aircraft, but lacked sufficient data., The event occurred near Foreman, Arkansas.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: A witness who described the light as bright and larger than any star.
